comment.author: 13935339@N05
comment._content: P-51B serial 43-7060 "Tommy's Dad" assigned to MAJ John C. 'Pappy' Herbst, commander of the 74th Ftr Sq, 23rd FG. Herbst's son was named Tommy - his only child. Herbst was later divorced, and married the actress Jeanne Eve Murphy on 3 July 1946. The next day Tommy was in the grandstands at Del Mar racetrack near San Diego when he witnessed his father's death during an aerobatic demonstration, a 2-ship flight of Lockheed P-80s from March Field, with MAJ Robin Olds as his wingman.
